categories: Category:Creatures of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The Junobian soft-shell sand flier, also known as the Junobian sand flier, was a species of non-sentient crustaceans, native to Junobia system, with delicate, sweet-tasting meat, which was considered a delicaly throughout the galaxy. Their meat tasted even better when harvested right after molted, when their new shells were soft enough to eat.
